title: Cruz del Sur de Bariloche
text: Cruz del Sur is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club located in the city of <a href="Bariloche">Bariloche</a> of <a href="R%C3%ADo%20Negro%20Province">Río Negro Province</a>. The squad currently plays in <a href="Torneo%20Argentino%20B">Torneo Argentino B</a>, the fourth division of the <a href="Argentine%20football%20league%20system">Argentine football league system</a>.
